work.title: Stocks and Info
work.description: A project by Avonlea Haymart, Noah Neighbors, and Dominic Griffis. Main features include cryptocurrency, the ability to save stocks, and search functionality. We wanted to make a website that allowed users to view stocks without having to make an account.

work.title: Software Company
work.description: This software company website has popping imperial red accents, which makes this one of my favorite pieces of work. I built the website upon React.js for the most efficient workflow.

work.title: Shibi Collector
work.description: This web app is a number game. The concept is to add up enough numbers to meet the current target. Each shibi avatar is assigned a random integer value every time the game resets.

work.title: MongoDB News Scrapper
work.description: This website scrapes data from a car news website, and stores them into a database. It allows the user to save articles and add notes to them.
